bouncing_betty.name: Bouncing Betty
bouncing_betty.description: A mine that jumps out of the ground and explodes.

javelin_missile.name: Javelin Missile
javelin_missile.description: Smart missile for the smart buyer. Hits tanks where it hurts... on top.

RPG-8.name: RPG-8
RPG-8.description: A classic with a molten copped shape charge. Perfect for non-ceramic armor.

tank_mine.name: Anti-Tank Mine
tank_mine.description: A big 'ole land mine that only a 10-ton-behemoth will set off.

goblins.name: Goblins
goblins.description: Bred in caves with a maniacal lust for all things boom. They tunnel too!

planks.name: Planks
planks.description: Special wood to support your sapping tunnels with.

black_powder.name: Black Powder
black_powder.description: It may be old school to all you hip C4-using sapper engineers, but if you have enough it'll get the job done.
